cli.help.title: Orbis Prism - Tools for Hytale modding
cli.help.init_desc: Detects HytaleServer.jar and saves the configuration.
cli.help.decompile_desc: Decompiles the JAR with JADX and keeps only com.hypixel.hytale.
cli.help.index_desc: Indexes the code into the SQLite database (FTS5).
cli.help.serve_desc: Starts the MCP server for AI.
cli.init.hint_env: - Set HYTALE_JAR_PATH or place the JAR in workspace/server/
cli.init.hint_windows: - On Windows, standard paths under %LOCALAPPDATA% are also searched.
cli.decompile.not_implemented: Command 'decompile' not implemented yet. See Phase 1 of the plan.
cli.index.not_implemented: Command 'index' not implemented yet. See Phase 2 of the plan.
cli.serve.not_implemented: Command 'serve' not implemented yet. See Phase 3 of the plan.
cli.help.lang_set_desc: Change the language (e.g. lang set en).
